MS MCQs

    Manipulate data by using code in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. Which function call retrieves only the last record in the filter from the Customer table?

      Customer.FindLast();

      Customer.Find(‘+’);

      Customer.Find(‘>’);

      Customer.FindSet;


    2. Which function retrieves a record by its primary key values?

      IsEmpty

      Find

      FindByKey

      Get


    3. What does the Validate function do when used?

      Initializes the field with a default value

      Runs the OnValidate trigger of a field

      Stops the code from running through the OnValidate trigger of a field

      Tests if a specific field holds a specific value.


    4. What does the TestField function do when used?

      Runs the OnValidate trigger of a field

      Validates the current value by running an assignment statement with the new value

      Generates an error for a specific field

      Tests if a specific field holds a specific value
